short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get reminded of saved bookmarks, whenever you open a new tab.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Buffle is a Chrome extension that helps you stay organized and on top of your saved bookmarks.

With Buffle, every time you open a new tab, you are presented with a randomly selected saved bookmark. This feature helps you discover new and interesting websites that you may have forgotten about, and also encourages you to revisit old favorites.

Extension's interface is intuitive and user-friendly. Once you install the extension, it seamlessly integrates with your saved bookmarks.  Shows you a single randomly selected bookmark in a simple non intrusive UI. you can choose to open and checkout your once forgotten bookmark

Buffle is designed to work offline and is built with privacy in mind. The extension does not collect or store any personal data, and all of your bookmarks are kept securely on your device.
